content: Does anyone have tips for configuration their notifications in Zulip? I find that I often miss messages I'm interested in. In particular, I'd like a way to be notified of new messages in topics that I've participated in.
@eholk the "recent topics" list (t) is quite useful for this
but overall I think there is a need for improvement

I sometimes temporarily enable notifications for a stream, and then eventually turn them off. There are a couple issues open for this: https://github.com/zulip/zulip/issues/12309 and https://github.com/zulip/zulip/issues/6027, I really hope they make progress on that.
